titleStmt.title: A letter sent from Col. VVill. Lockhart, dated at Dunkirk, Decemb. 31. 1659. Superscribed, for the Right Honourable, William Lenthall, Esq; Speaker of the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England. Read in Parliament, January 3. 1659.
titleStmt.author: Lockhart, William, Sir, fl. 1621-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Streater, and John Macock, printers to the Parliament,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
